html:
** Shares of technology co AEVA.N rise as much 11.76% to 7.89 premarket

** Stock among top pct. gainers on NYSE

** Co signs a deal with an "undisclosed large company" to develop a sensor for a self-driving car (Full Story)

** AVEVA cannot disclose when it would go into mass production with the undisclosed customer - CEO Soroush Salehian in an interview

** Co has deals with automotive suppliers Denso Corp 6902.T and ZF Friedrichshafen AG to mass-manufacture its sensors

** Founded by two ex-Apple Inc AAPL.O engineers, AVEVA's sensor helps self-driving cars navigate through the lidar technology that uses lasers, much like radars use radio waves

** Co's Q1 sales miss estimates - Refinitiv IBES data

** Up to last close, stock down ~51% YTD


(Reporting by Rithika Krishna in Bengaluru)

(( Rithika.Krishna@thomsonreuters.com ;))
